tns:patch.author: jdeanquin
tns:patch.description: List of teams that has at least one team member

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_g_settings_team_run_report AS select amp_team_id as id,name as value from amp_team where amp_team_id in (select amp_team_id from amp_team_member ) order by name asc
